name: Papermonium
description:
Papermonium is a racing based game that embodies modern day
issues. You play as the driver for Papers Delivery Inc. with an array
of cars to choose from.
As time goes by, a virus spreads through town. The citizens are
forced to stay in for the quarantine and it is up to you to help them
face this adversity
Beware of the virus though as you may be subject to contamination.
Unlock new cars and get to driving!
